name: We Lost The Game
description:
The game broke and all that is left is your ability to move left and right! Now its up to you to gather the games objects and mechanics to return the game to its former glory.

Collect game mechanics to jump, wall climb, and grapple to easily traverse the world, but watch out, because rebuilding the game means creating some obstacles too...

This game was built for the 2021 Global Game Jam.
